page.title: 15Children's leisure in Ilford
page.content:
In answer to a survey on{leisure.} A typical boy living in Seven Kings, said: He watched 3 hours of{tv}most nights; he liked 6Os{music}and "Frankie goes to Hollywood"; he plays this on tape and on disc; his{favourite food}is "chinese" and "pizza and chips"; his hobby is keeping his{bedroom "looking cool" and he likes his dog and his video especially with horror films and "nasties" he does not go to any{clubs}although there is a Scout Group nearby; he likes the area and has been living there for 5 years.
Brian James, Brian Arnold, Marc Naylor Chadwell Heath High School.
